projects.portfolio: I completed this project using React.js, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS. I used React-type-animation to animate the text in the 'Hero' section. I implemented a dark theme and page translation into four languages using Next-Intl.
projects.the-box: I made this project for a contruction company using React.
projects.freaks: This is a landing page that I made for the 'Freaks of Nature' music festival.
projects.quickfit: This is a landing page that I made for my portfolio using a Figma mockup. In this project, I implemented Spline 3D graphics.
projects.nft: A landing page for my portfolio using only HTML, SCSS, JS, with some animations and without any framework.
projects.funiro: Shop landing page for my portfolio using pure vanilla JS, HTML, and CSS
projects.farm-vest: A landing page for my portfolio with scrolling and cursor animations
